                      什么值得买是一家中立的消费门户网站，好价信息来自热心值友爆料和商家自荐，经小编人工审核或小值机器人智能判断后发布。促销折扣可能随时变化，请值友们购买前注意核实。

                        <label for="haojia_error1_four"></label>
                        <label for="haojia_error1_four" class="">虚假宣传</label>
                    </li>

                    <li>
                        <input type="radio" id="haojia_error1_five" data-type="20" name="haojia_error1" class="rd">
                        <label for="haojia_error1_five"></label>
                        <label for="haojia_error1_five" class="">虚假互动</label>
                    </li>
                </ul>
                <button>确认提交</button>
            </div>
        </li>

        <li class="li other goods" id="other_report_reason1" data-name="商品问题">商品问题
            <div class="other_report_box goods_report_box">
                请选择举报理由：
                <ul class="report_reason report_reason1">
                    <li>
                        <input type="radio" id="report_reason_one" data-type="18" name="report_reason" class="rd">
                        <label for="report_reason_one"></label>
                        <label for="report_reason_one" class="">假冒伪劣</label>
                    </li>
                    <li>
                        <input type="radio" id="report_reason_two" data-type="27" name="report_reason" class="rd">
                        <label for="report_reason_two"></label>
                        <label for="report_reason_two">违禁商品</label>
                    </li>
                    <li>
                        <input type="radio" id="report_reason_three" data-type="28" name="report_reason" class="rd">
                        <label for="report_reason_three"></label>
                        <label for="report_reason_three">其他违规</label>
                    </li>
                </ul>
                <button>确认提交</button>
            </div>
        </li>

        <li class="li other goods" id="haojia_error2" data-name="侵权举报">
            侵权举报
            <div class="other_report_box goods_report_box">
                请选择举报理由：
                <ul class="report_reason report_reason1">
                    <li>
                        <input type="radio" id="haojia_error2_one" data-type="21" name="haojia_error2" class="rd">
                        <label for="haojia_error2_one"></label>
                        <label for="haojia_error2_one" class="">商品图片侵权</label>
                    </li>

                    <li>
                        <input type="radio" id="haojia_error2_two" data-type="22" name="haojia_error2" class="rd">

            </div>
        </li>
        <!-- 新增其他举报 -->
        <li class="li other goods" data-name="其他" data-type="29" id="other_alert">
            其他
        </li>
    </ul>
</div>
      <!--打分模块-   id 是  rating_  +  文章id  -->

        <!--[if lt IE 8]>x<![endif]--></i>
    <div class="pop-title" id="popTitle">
        <div class="pop-name">评论举报</div>
    </div>
    <div class="pop-content">
        <div class="pop_width_400">
            <p class="pop_info">
                <span class="pop_jubao jubao-circle">
                    <input type="radio" class="normal" id="pop_report_1" name="report">
                    <label for="pop_report_1">垃圾广告！</label></span>
                <span class="pop_jubao jubao-circle">

<div class="aside-right" id="feed-side">
    <!--顶部  爆料  share模块 -->
    <div class="baoliao-box">
    <p class="txt">
        爆料是一件简单又好玩的事，动动手指就能把你认可的好价商品分享给千万值友，还能获得大量金币奖励，兑换礼品卡和值得买定制礼品！赶快行动起来吧！
        <a href="javascript:void(0);" class="J_check_video">点击观看视频吧~</a>
        <i class="J_check_video icon-video-o-thin"></i>
    </p>
        <div class="video">
        </div>
        <a href="https://www.smzdm.com/baoliao/" target="_blank" class="btn-go" onclick="dataLayer.push({'event':'1210013','name':'右侧爆料模块'})">我要爆料</a>
    <div class="rookie-award-container">
        <div class="J_rookie_award rookie-award">
            <span>爆料新人可获额外奖励</span>
            <i class="icon icon-info-mark-o-thin"></i>
            <div class="rookie-award-desc">
                <h5>新人奖励</h5>
                <p>前5篇发布银牌及以上层级爆料每篇奖励3金币，第6至10篇每篇奖励6金币。</p>
